talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>That's right, we are Theega Clan!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Wait, no!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00>The<sp:5:0:0> Yi<sp:5:0:0>ga <sp:5:0:0>Clan!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>The YIGA Clan, not Theega Clan!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, never mind...<sp:5:0:0> You clearly need an
explanation. <sp:5:1:0>The Yiga Clan is...
talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>a powerful, brave group of warriors
founded by Master Kohga and dedicated
to defeating a truly repugnant hero!
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>All things considered...<sp:5:1:0>I'd say our meeting
here was fairly fortunate.<sp:0:4:0>Wouldn't you agree,<sp:5:0:0> my<sp:5:0:0> dear <sp:5:0:0>Link?
talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>Well, just hear me out before you turn
down the offer. The Yiga Clan is...
talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>That's a foolish choice. One that you
will not survive making...
talk_1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I was foolish to think you might have the
skill and cunning to replace our master...<sp:0:4:0>But not as foolish as you!
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>I can tell you've trained your body well.<sp:5:1:0>
Just looking at you, I'd say...you're
familiar with sword and bow alike, yes?
I'd wager you could learn to manipulate
the ground with the Earthwake technique.
Why not join the Yiga Clan and do so?
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>You can't avoid us forever, you know.
Will you join the Yiga Clan?
talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>a group of brave warriors, founded by
Master Kohga—who YOU defeated—<sp:5:1:0>set
on defeating a vile, twisted hero!
talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Are you on a job too?<sp:5:1:0> Well, this is my
territory, so go somewhere else.<sp:0:4:0>I'm keeping an eye out for Link, our
clan's archenemy!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>But he's going to be suspicious if he sees
you hanging around in full Yiga Clan garb.<sp:0:4:0>After all the effort it took to perfect this
<clr:0000>disguise<clr:ffff>, I am not letting you ruin my
plan. Get lost!
talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Are you new? Look, I get that you want to
show off that magnificent gear, but...

<sp:3:0:2:0900>If you stand around looking like that,
it'll tip Link off that I'm in the Yiga Clan!<sp:0:4:0>Go hide over there!
